title: Rush Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Rush multi-package build tool

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

customCommands.title: Custom Commands
customCommands.description: A list of custom commands that can be invoked from the Rush command line

name.title: Custom Command Name
name.description: The name of the custom command, which can be invoked via "rush <name>"

description.title: Custom Command Description
description.description: A short description of the custom command, which will appear when printing command line usage (e.g. "rush --help")

customOptions.title: Custom Options
customOptions.description: A list of custom options that can be associated with commands

associatedCommands.title: Supported Commands
associatedCommands.description: A list of commands which this option can be used with

shortName.title: Shortened Name
shortName.description: A optional shortened value for the flag (e.g. --verbose might become -v)

enumValues.title: Enum Values
enumValues.description: A list of possible options for this flag

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: If this flag is omitted, use this value by default
